definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
the West (Europe and North America)/countries of the Indian Ocean (traditional)
distant seas/the open ocean (far from the coast)
to study abroad (old term)/same as 留學|留学
brimming with enthusiasm (idiom); full of warmth

sentences.english: Should have a living environment of…
sentences.chinese: 搞西洋画的，生活环境也应该洋一点。

sentences.english: Can you taste pepper in the pudding?
sentences.chinese: 我能尝到调味品中的洋苏叶。

sentences.english: When rice cooked, add chopped parsley and let rest for 5 minutes and serve.
sentences.chinese: 饭熟后，加入洋芫荽拌匀，继续焗5分钟即成。

sentences.english: The locust-tree were in bloom and the fragrance of the blossoms filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 洋槐树正开着花，空气里弥漫着芬芳的花香。

sentences.english: I will protect you and break open the crowds in your way like an ice-breaker in arctic sea.
sentences.chinese: 我要护著妳，拨开挡路的人群如破冰船行在北极冰洋。

sentences.english: Turn off the heat add linguine and toss well garnish with parsley. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 关火后加入意粉拌匀，加入洋芫荽即可享用。

sentences.english: Never copy foreign things blindly or mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 决不要盲目地机械地照搬洋东西。

sentences.english: For in- stance, Korean football realized its taking-off through the employing of foreign coaches.
sentences.chinese: 韩国的足球就是靠聘请洋教练实现起飞的。

sentences.english: What is the use of these differerent toeign toys ?
sentences.chinese: 这些所谓的洋玩具有什么用呢？

sentences.english: Eric is one of the job-hopping foreigners living in China.
sentences.chinese: 艾瑞克是生活在中国的洋漂族之一。

sentences.english: The Golden Gate Bridge spans the opening of San Francisco Bay into the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 金门大桥横跨整个开放的旧金山海湾到宁靖洋的。

sentences.english: I can taste sage in the dressing.
sentences.chinese: 我能尝到调味品中的洋苏叶。

sentences.english: We will be watching closely as theaftershocks are felt across the Pacific and South-East Asiathroughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 我们也将全天紧密关注整个环宁靖洋和东亚地区。

sentences.english: The locust-trees were in bloom and the fragrance of the blossoms filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 洋槐树正开着花，空气里弥漫着芬芳的花香。

sentences.english: A tiny flame burnt in the oil lamp on the table.
sentences.chinese: 板桌上的洋油灯只有黄豆大小的一粒光焰。

sentences.english: In addition to the dirty of volatile solvents, to airproof .
sentences.chinese: 不兴不不污剂洋的溶剂难挥发，给夺目密封。

definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to store/to stand/space between the door and the entrance screen
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
